text: Kɨ fomɨra Masedonian Provinsɨn ghughava, egha dughiar kamɨn kɨ akar gavgavir mam nɨ ganɨngi, egha datɨrɨghɨn kɨ akar kamra ua kamaghɨn nɨ mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ ghaze, nɨ Efesusɨn Nguibar Ekiamɨn ikɨva egh gumazir maba mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavim me danɨng suam, me gumaziba Godɨn akamɨn men sure damuva, akar ifavarir taba me damuvɨra ikian markɨ.
